text: Timoti, nɨ bar deravɨra ingangarir God nɨ ganɨngizir kamɨn gan. Egh pura akar Godɨn nɨghnɨzimɨn gɨn zuir puvatɨziba akɨrim ragh dagh asaragh. Egh nɨ gan fogh, gumazir kaba ifara ghaze, e Godɨn fofozim ikiava, egha men nɨghnɨziba ko Godɨn nɨghnɨziba uari adosi. Nɨ gumazir kaba bar men saghon ikɨ.
